effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by two stages.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by two stages.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. This may also harshly lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. This may also harshly lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. This may also harshly lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
